Candy Analysis:

- This dataset is 3 years worth of survey data asking individuals their opinions on candy as well as country and gender if they wish to answer
- Individually cleaned each dataset - removed irrelevant columns, pivoted the candy_type to a new long column
- Cleaned column names, changed names to be consistent with each dataset to prepare for binding
- Bound columns together
- Filtered the age column for numerical values, set limit on age
- Removed special characters from candy_type column
- Hard coded countries for spelling mistakes/consistency
